trans-unit.source: Provides an interface that extends <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> to specify whether errors are tolerated while loading a design document.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface que estende <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost" /> para especificar se erros são tolerados ao carregar um documento de design.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2> interface to specify whether the designer loader can continue loading when errors occur during deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2> interface para especificar se o carregador de designer pode continuar a carregar quando ocorrerem erros durante a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether it is possible to reload with errors.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se é possível recarregar com erros.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer loader can reload the design document when errors are detected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o carregador de designer pode recarregar o documento de design quando forem detectados erros; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: In some scenarios, loading errors cannot be ignored.
trans-unit.target: Em alguns cenários, erros de carregamento não podem ser ignorado.

trans-unit.source: The designer loader implementation should return `false` when this is the case.
trans-unit.target: A implementação do carregador de designer deve retornar `false` quando esse for o caso.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether errors should be ignored when <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os erros devem ser ignorados quando <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost.Reload" /> é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the designer loader will ignore errors when it reloads; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o carregador de designer irá ignorar erros quando ele é recarregado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.IgnoreErrorsDuringReload%2A> property can only be set to `true` if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.IgnoreErrorsDuringReload%2A> propriedade só pode ser definida como `true` se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> is `false`, the value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.IgnoreErrorsDuringReload%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.CanReloadWithErrors%2A> é `false`, o valor de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderHost2.IgnoreErrorsDuringReload%2A> será ignorado.
